base_id.title: Base ID
base_id.description: The ID of the base you want to extract tables from.

table_name.title: Table name
table_name.description: The name of the table in Airtable base you want to download.

use_view.title: Use View
use_view.description: if checked - extraction is done from the view not the table itself

view_name.title: View name
view_name.description: The name of the view in Airtable base you want to download.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: The fields you want to download. You may leave this empty to download all fields. If use_view hidden columns are returned empty.

sync_mode.title: Sync Mode
sync_mode.description: Full Sync downloads all data from the source every run. Incremental Sync downloads data created or updated in a specified time range by field CREATED_TIME() or LAST_MODIFIED_TIME(), fields are described in Airtable - Formula field reference.

date_from.title: Date From
date_from.description: Date from which data is downloaded. Either date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. You can also set this as last run, which will fetch data from the last run of the component.

date_to.title: Date to
date_to.description: Date to which data is downloaded. Either date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, now, etc.

table_name.title: Storage Table Name
table_name.description: Name of the destination table. Source table name will be used if not specified.

incremental_loading.title: Load Type
incremental_loading.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If Incremental Load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table.
